document.full_text: the cost of imported products in the united states rose for a seventh straight month in april thanks to a weaker dollar, and more owners of small businesses raised prices, in potentially worrying signs of inflation.
document.title: import, small business data point to inflation
lines_and_colors: the cost of imported products in the united states rose for a seventh straight month in april thanks to a weaker dollar, and more owners of small businesses raised prices, in potentially worrying signs of inflation.
